This stunning extension brings the spirit of the ocean and Moana’s courageous journey to your browser in breathtaking 4K quality. Perfect for fans of Disney’s Moana, it transforms your new tab into a tropical paradise full of adventure and beauty.

Set sail on an oceanic journey with Moana every time you open a new tab!

Features:
🌊 Live 4K Wallpaper: Vibrant, animated scenes from Moana’s journey across the Pacific Ocean.
🌐 Popular Site Shortcuts: Quickly access your favorite websites with pre-set shortcuts.
➕ Addable Shortcuts: Personalize your new tab with links to frequently visited sites.
🔍 Search Bar: Easily search the web using your preferred search engine.
🕒 Calendar & Clock: Keep track of your day with the built-in clock and calendar display.
Why Choose This Extension?
This extension is lightweight, secure, and designed with privacy in mind. It’s simple to install and can be removed at any time through your browser settings.

Discover more live wallpapers featuring Disney’s beloved characters, animated adventures, and tropical themes. The extension includes a note-taking tool, a privacy policy, and an easy uninstall option.

Download the Moana 4K Wallpaper now and bring the beauty of the ocean to your Chrome browser. Visit our website for more stunning live wallpaper extensions!
